methodology: Backend AI reasoning via GitHub Copilot - semantic analysis of each prompt to select appropriate canonical tasks

compositions.prompt: Prioritize my meeting invitations and show which ones need immediate attention

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse user intent: 'prioritize', 'immediate attention' - requires NLU
Retrieve meeting invitations from calendar system
Extract RSVP status, sender details, required vs optional - parent task for prioritization
Classify meeting types (1:1, team, customer) to inform prioritization
Assess importance based on organizer, attendees, urgency indicators
Rank invitations by importance for 'prioritize' requirement
Check which invitations still need response - 'immediate attention' trigger

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-07 → [CAN-02A, CAN-02B] → CAN-11 → CAN-13

compositions.prompt: Flag meetings that need prep and automatically schedule prep time before them

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'flag meetings', 'need prep', 'automatically schedule'
Retrieve upcoming meetings
Extract attachments, agenda, attendees to determine prep needs
High-importance meetings likely need prep
Estimate how much prep time needed for each meeting
Parse meeting times to schedule prep blocks before
Find valid slots for prep time without conflicts
Create prep time blocks on calendar
Suggest which meetings need prep and optimal prep times

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-07 → CAN-02B → CAN-21 → CAN-06 → CAN-12 → CAN-03 → CAN-14

compositions.prompt: Show me my meeting patterns and help me reclaim time from low-value meetings

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'show patterns', 'reclaim time', 'low-value'
Retrieve historical meeting data for pattern analysis
Classify meetings by type to identify patterns
Assess which meetings are low-value
Aggregate meetings to find patterns (frequency, duration, attendees)
Rank meetings by value to identify low-value candidates
'Show me patterns' requires visual representation
Suggest specific meetings to decline/delegate/shorten

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → [CAN-02A, CAN-02B] → CAN-10 → CAN-11 → CAN-20 → CAN-14

compositions.prompt: Schedule a weekly 1:1 with my manager and auto-reschedule if conflicts arise

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'weekly 1:1', 'manager', 'auto-reschedule if conflicts'
Identify manager as required attendee
Retrieve both user's and manager's calendars for availability
Parse 'weekly' to determine recurrence pattern
Create weekly recurrence for 1:1
Find mutually available time slots
Create the recurring 1:1 meeting
Monitor for conflicts that arise
'Auto-reschedule if conflicts' - key requirement
Determine which meeting to move when conflicts occur

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-05 → CAN-01 → CAN-06 → CAN-15 → CAN-12 → CAN-03 → CAN-16 → [CAN-17, CAN-23]

compositions.prompt: Bump meetings that can be moved to make room for urgent requests

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'bump meetings', 'can be moved', 'urgent requests'
Retrieve current calendar and pending requests
Extract metadata to determine which meetings are movable
Identify which meetings are low-priority (movable) vs urgent
Tentative RSVPs easier to reschedule than confirmed
Parse meeting durations to find suitable slots
Find new slots for bumped meetings
Create/update meeting times

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-07 → [CAN-02B, CAN-13] → CAN-06 → CAN-12 → CAN-03

compositions.prompt: Schedule team sync with priority rules and find a conference room

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'team sync', 'priority rules', 'conference room'
Retrieve team members' calendars
Identify team members as required attendees
Extract team composition, required resources
Parse duration requirements for sync
'Priority rules' - rank attendees or time slots by importance
Find time that works for team with priority weighting
'Find conference room' - explicit resource booking requirement
Create meeting with room reservation

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-05 → CAN-07 → CAN-06 → CAN-11 → CAN-12 → CAN-19 → CAN-03

compositions.prompt: Prep an agenda for my 1:1 with work updates and potential discussion topics

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'prep agenda', '1:1', 'work updates', 'discussion topics'
Retrieve the 1:1 meeting details and recent meetings
Identify the 1:1 partner for context
Extract previous agendas, notes, action items from past 1:1s
Analyze work documents, emails, shared files for updates
Identify user's work updates to include in agenda
Anticipate potential discussion topics - blockers, concerns, decisions needed
Generate structured agenda document

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-05 → CAN-07 → CAN-08 → CAN-22 → CAN-18 → CAN-09

compositions.prompt: Pull together a briefing for my upcoming 1:1

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'pull together briefing', 'upcoming 1:1'
Retrieve the upcoming 1:1 meeting
Confirm it's a 1:1 to tailor briefing format
Identify the other participant for context
Extract history, previous notes, action items
Analyze recent communications, shared documents
Generate briefing document

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-02A → CAN-05 → CAN-07 → CAN-08 → CAN-09

compositions.prompt: Generate a team quarterly work summary from our meetings

execution_plan.reasoning: Parse 'team quarterly work summary', 'from meetings'
Retrieve team meetings from past quarter
Filter for team meetings (exclude 1:1s, external)
Identify team members for attribution
Extract notes, agendas, action items from meetings
Analyze meeting documents, presentations, deliverables
Attribute work accomplishments to team members
Generate quarterly summary report

compositions.orchestration: CAN-04 → CAN-01 → CAN-02A → CAN-05 → CAN-07 → CAN-08 → CAN-22 → CAN-09

summary.notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 backend AI reasoning achieved 100% task coverage (24/24 tasks) when considering all unique tasks across the 9 prompts. All specialized Tier 3 tasks (CAN-18, CAN-20, CAN-23) were appropriately selected based on prompt semantics.
